attributes.action: Remove paper assignment submissions from Universities across the UK
attributes.background: In the UK every year students are required to submit paper copies of assignments to be marked. Dissertations and thesis' also have to be submitted on paper, this totals thousands of wasted paper per year when student work can be viewed electronically it is time to ban paper submissions in the UK.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. This would be a matter for the universities themselves.

You could raise the issue with individual universities or make your suggestion to a representative organisation like Universities UK:

https://www.universitiesuk.ac.uk/Pages/contact-us.aspx
